name: Eternal Black
description: Our iconic model, Atom. Our best seller. The perfect mix to get the aesthetic and formal look of a shoe with the comfort and technical qualities of a sneaker.Exterior fabric made of black spandex foaming, inner lining made of grey technical mesh, ergonomic foam insole, black / white color polyurethane sole, black laces

name: Atom Brown Boot
description: Our interpretation of the classic dessert boot combined with the aesthetics of our smart and minimalist Atom silhouette.Outer brown microfiber fabric (suede appearance), inner lining made of white technical mesh, ergonomic foam insole, dark grey / light grey color polyurethane sole, brown laces. The fabric made this boot water resistant in medium - light rainy days.Boot height: 4 - 5 centimetres over the ankle

description: Our interpretation of the classic dessert boot combined with the aesthetics of our smart and minimalist Atom silhouette.Outer brown microfiber fabric (suede appearance), inner lining made of white technical mesh, ergonomic foam insole, dark grey / light grey color polyurethane sole, brown laces. name: Hybrid Black
description: We like experimenting and going beyond. We love to play, that is why we combined the elements of our previous models in order to obtain the perfect blend: Hybrid.Our new model comes from merging the lightweight EVA sole from Army model and the elegant cut in vegan leather from Erosion. Better together: more features, more comfort, sportier and elegant at the same time.Size indication: if you have a medium or wide upper or foot, we recommend you choose a higher size than usual
